mapper.update: update m_flow_month r set r.MAXFLOW=#{maxFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , r.RESIDUEFLOW=#{maxFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}-r.USEDFLOW, r.MAXROAMFLOW=#{maxRoamFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , r.RESIDUEROAMFLOW=#{maxRoamFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}-r.USEDROAMFLOW, r.LASTUPDATETIME=now() where exists (select 1 from m_simcard t where r.IMSI=t.imsi and t.PACKAGEID=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) and r.ACCOUNTPERIODENDDATE>=now() and r.ACCOUNTPERIODSTARTDATE<=now()

update m_flow_month set date=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accountPeriodStartDate = #{accountPeriodStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, accountPeriodEndDate = #{accountPeriodEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, usedFlow = #{usedFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, residueFlow = #{residueFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usedRoamFlow = #{usedRoamFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, residueRoamFlow = #{residueRoamFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lastUpDatetime = #{lastUpDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, maxFlow = #{maxFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, maxRoamFlow = #{maxRoamFlow,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
